ingredients.ingredient: 1 small watermelon, fruit removed with a melon baller
1 (8 ounce) package fresh mozzarella cheese, cut into small pieces
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Use a melon baller to create perfect watermelon spheres for elegant presentation
Assemble appetizers just before serving to prevent watermelon from releasing excess liquid
Drizzle balsamic vinegar and olive oil just before serving for optimal flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How will you assemble and time these appetizers to keep everything fresh and prevent sogginess?
